mapper.select: SELECT rev.order_id,item.goods_id,ord.user_id FROM newbee_mall_db.tb_newbee_mall_order_item as item left join review as rev on rev.order_id=item .order_id and rev.goods_id=item.goods_id left join tb_newbee_mall_order as ord on item.order_id=ord.order_id where rev.order_id is null and item.goods_id =#{goodsId} and user_id=#{userId}
SELECT rating ,count(rating) as count_rating from review where goods_id=#{goodsId} and proved=0 group by rating order by rating desc
SELECT count(*) as allReview,avg(rating)as avgRating,count(rating) as allRating FROM newbee_mall_db.review where goods_id=#{goodsId} and proved=0 and title is not null
